item.description:
Our fellow Ex-Southerner, Lauren, is hosting Holiday Cheer and Beer through her Meetup group Fun with Alcohol. Details as follows... Hope to see y'all there!

Come gather for our 2nd Annual Fun with Alcohol "Holiday Cheer and Beer!" as we make our way through Harvard Square by candle light. You may wish bring your own candle to light your way (optional). I encourage persons of all religions and backgrounds to attend. Attendees must be 21+

PARKING: is unrestricted in Cambridge on SUNDAYS. Recommended, take the T to Harvard Square on the RED line

DRESS:LADDIES DRESS IN CAPS, SCARVES & MITTENS/ LASSIES DRESS IN HAT, SHAWL & MITTENS
PART I
PUB CRAWL SCHEDULE:
5:00 GRENDEL'S DEN 89 Winthrop Street for Half Price Appetizers with a drink purchase. This place is located downstairs in the basement. They have wonderful hot cider with spiced rum and a variety of food items ranging from burgers to salads. You may check the menu here.


6:00 RUSSELL'S TAVERN 14 JFK Street ...spontaneous caroling may occur, however this is not a requirement. Click for menu here

6:45 JOHN HARVARD'S BREW HOUSE 33 Dunster Street ...ANY Beer by the PITCHER $13.95. Click for beer menu here

7:30 TOMMY DOYLE'S 96 Winthrop Street, located on the 2nd floor "Loft".Warm up with more Cheer and OPEN MIKE entertainment. Tommy Doyle's has come out with "New England Winter Drinks" such as Hot Toddy, Peppermint paddy Hot Chocolate, Russian Stoli Vanilla Hot Chocolate, West Cork Hot Cider, and Nutty Irish Coffee. Appetizers are half priced with any drink purchase (mention you are with our group when ordering....a 20% gratuity will be included on your tab).

Part II
8:00 - 11 :00 LIVE BAND Showcase @ TOMMY DOYLES: Featuring "Brock and Roll Revival Band" and selected local area musicians.

HOW TO FIND ME (Lauren): You can find me by the LED lights on my reindeer antlers....WARNING!!...spontaneous caroling may occur at any moment along the way.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB AT ALL TIMES! There is no charge to attend this event. Please remember that in order to bring you half price appetizers with drink purchase deals or the beer pitcher deals ...a 20% gratuity will be automatically added to your tab.

..
item.name: "Holiday Cheer and Beer" Pub Crawl in Harvard Square
